data.actual_result: ESC presses are ignored until the game loses and regains focus.
data.expected_result: Hitting ESC the second time should close the game menu
data.short_description: Overlay can eat ESC key presses in league and overwatch
data.steps_to_repro: - Open overwatch or league - Open up the overlay - Right click out of the overlay to close it - Hit ESC to bring up a menu - Hit ESC a second time. The game should ignore the ESC until you click out of the game.
